alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin; Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 5:29AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A LOCALIZED AREA OF MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL HENNEPIN...NORTHEASTERN SCOTT AND EASTERN CARVER COUNTIES... At 526 AM CST, an area of moderate snow was located over Chanhassen, or 14 miles southwest of Minneapolis. The snow appears to be drifting southeast, although motion is uncertain with little or no signature present on radar. Snowfall rates around a half inch per hour are possible with this area of snow. Around a half inch has fallen at the National Weather Service office in Chanhassen. Locations impacted include... Bloomington, Eden Prairie, Shakopee, Savage, Chaska, Chanhassen, Prior Lake, Excelsior, Shorewood, Flying Cloud Airport and Minnesota Valley State Recreation Area.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
